*A step by step tutorial on how to run the trading system application.*

= Introduction =

Running the application is extremely simple, however I provide a step by step tutorial to make it even easier.

= Details =

 # Download the trading system app from [http://trading-system-aid.googlecode.com/files/trading-system-app.zip here].
 # Uncompress the zip file in a convenient directory. Examples: `C:\` (Windows), `/home/<user>/myapps` (Linux).
 # Go to <uncompressed>\apache-tomcat-5.5.26\bin and execute `startup.bat` (Windows) or `startup` (Linux).
 # After this, open your browser and go to [http://localhost:8080/tradingsystem/ tradingsystem]
 # *Enjoy it!* Hoping to get some feedback!
